name: Run OR Gun (AliYil)
description:
This is a top-down-shooter game where you kill zombies to proceed levels.

But you can have only one ammo!

Be careful with your aim. Every shot is precious! If you have no ammo, you need to avoid zombies until you pick up one!

This game is for Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2019, where the theme is "only one" and made within 48 hours, by two people. This game fits the theme by allowing you to have only one ammo.

Source code for this game can be found at: https://github.com/AliYil/gmtkjam19

Credits:

  • Game design, levels, coding: AliYil
  • Textures and logo: Fernweh
  • Freesound for sound effects
